config.hidegreenhousetiles.name: Hide Greenhouse Entry Tiles
config.hidegreenhousetiles.description: Removes the entry patio tiles from the Greenhouse.
config.hidegreenhouseshadow.name: Hide Greenhouse Shadows
config.hidegreenhouseshadow.description: Removes all shadows being cast by the Greenhouse.
config.greenhousesoftshadow.name: Greenhouse Soft Shadows
config.greenhousesoftshadow.description:
Shadows cast by the greenhouse will match the soft shadows of other buildings.
Has no effect with Hide Greenhouse Shadows enabled.
config.hideallothershadows.name: Hide All Other Shadows
config.hideallothershadows.description:
When enabled, all specific buildings other than the Greenhouse
will have their shadows hidden, regardless of their config setting.
